name: Mine Shaft
description:
MINE SHAFT
Welcome to the exciting world of Mine shaft! In this 2D mining game, you play as a miner who is trying to make a fortune by digging deep into the earth's crust to find valuable minerals with drilling machine.
Your primary goal is to mine as much ore as possible and sell it for a profit. The more ore you mine, the more money you earn, which allows you to upgrade your equipment and tools.
As you progress through the game, you'll encounter various obstacles such as rocks and lava. You need to use your wits and skills to navigate these obstacles and continue mining.
The game features a shop where you can purchase new equipment, tools, and upgrades with the money you earn from selling minerals.
